## Reports & Power Analysis

Since 2016 I'm offering professional statistical reports (German: **Gutachten**) for sample size calculations & Power Analyses. The following reports are a selection of the major projects for which I did the power analysis. Please note: in Germany every experimental application using animals is required to provide a proper power analysis. Most of the following titles are therefore in German.
